name: Night Crawler
description:
Arachne flips up to her infinite web, hanging upside down above the lane and increasing her movement speed. She may leap off the web to deal damage to all enemies in the target area and create a large web around the target area. The web area provides the sameslow to enemies and benefit to Arachne as her Web Trail.
Arachne may activate Ability 1 and 2 while running on this web.
